column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Fong says : " Avatar Aang , we were all amazed at the stories of how you singlehandedly wiped out an entire Fire Navy fleet at the North Pole .
#Text=" Fong says : " Avatar , you 're ready to face the Fire Lord now .
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=No I 'm not !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang still needs to master all four elements .
#Text=" Fong says : " Why ?
#Text=With the kind of power he possesses , power enough to destroy hundreds of battle ships in a matter of minutes , he could defeat the Fire Lord now !
#Text=" Sokka says : " But sir , the thing is , Aang can only do those things when he 's in the Avatar State .
#Text=" Aang says : " See , it 's this special state where - " Fong says : " I 'm well aware !
#Text=Your eyes and tattoos glow and you 're able to summon unbelievable power .
#Text=Without you , we 'd be slaughtered before we even reach their shores .
#Text=But with you leading the way , as the ultimate weapon , we could cut a swath right through to the heart of the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Aang says : " Right , but , I do n't know how to get in or out of the Avatar State , much less what to do once I 'm there .
#Text=" Fong says : " So , it 's decided then .
#Text=I 'll help you figure out how to get into the Avatar State and then you 'll face your destiny .
#Text=" Katara says : " No , nothing 's decided .
#Text=We already have a plan .
#Text=Aang 's pursuing his destiny his way .
#Text=" Fong says : " Well , while you take your time learning the elements , the War goes on .
#Text=May I show you something ?
#Text=That 's the infirmary , and those soldiers are the lucky ones .
#Text=They came back .
#Text=Every day , the Fire Nation takes lives .
#Text=People are dying , Aang !
#Text=You could end it , now .
#Text=Think about it .
#Text="
